title: Soma Sex Dreams
author: Jeto
citation: Jeto. "Soma Sex Dreams: experience with Carisoprodol (Soma) (ID 10171)". Erowid.org. Oct 24, 2001. erowid.org/exp/10171
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

[ Switch Colors ]
report: Quite some time ago, soma compound (carisoprodol & aspirin) (or soma compound with codeine) was prescribed by my doctor to treat pain and muscle tension associated with TMJ. Shortly after taking meds, I noticed an increase in frequency of sex dreams. Great dreams! I have taken other muscle relaxers and pain medications since, but have never encountered the same experience. The dreams seemed to directly correlate with the soma. Eventually the dreams subsided after I discontinued use (about 1 year). After that, the dreams occurred with less frequency and intensity.
